image.alt: Smiling patients and the friendly team at Dr. Alyssa Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: Welcome to Dr. Alyssa Orthodontics, serving Sherman/Denison, Bonham, and Gainesville, TX. We provide a patient-first orthodontic experience that blends clinical excellence, modern technology, and a friendly, caring team.

Dr. Alyssa and her staff create personalized treatment plans with in-office or virtual options, complimentary consultations, and flexible payment plans to make great smiles accessible to every family.

items.title: Complimentary Consults
items.text: Free in-office or virtual consultations and observations so you can learn your options before committing to treatment.

items.title: Virtual Care
items.text: AO Go virtual monitoring and remote check-ins reduce in-office visits while keeping treatment on track.

items.title: Experienced Care
items.text: Dr. Alyssa, DDS, MS, brings evidence-driven techniques and years of lecturing experience to deliver predictable orthodontic care.

items.title: Flexible Financing
items.text: Multiple interest-free office plans, CareCredit options, and staff support to verify insurance benefits and simplify budgeting.

paragraphs.text: Dr. Alyssa Emory-Carter, DDS, MS, leads our practice with a patient-first approach and a focus on modern, predictable orthodontic care. She is a Diamond Plus Invisalign<sup>®</sup> Provider and a recognized educator, including receiving the Key Opinion Leader Educator of the Year award at the Dental Monitoring Summit in 2023. Dr. Alyssa uses state-of-the-art tools such as iTero® digital scanning to create individualized treatment plans and routinely presents clinical insights at national meetings.

Education: Oklahoma State University (BA); Baylor College of Dentistry (DDS); University of Florida College of Dentistry (MS). Dr. Alyssa values community involvement and enjoys meeting patients and families across Sherman/Denison, Bonham, and Gainesville.

image.alt: Dr. Alyssa Emory-Carter, orthodontist at Dr. Alyssa Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: We offer Invisalign<sup>®</sup> clear aligners, comprehensive braces options, and AO Go virtual monitoring to fit each patient’s needs. Book a complimentary consultation to learn which treatment is right for you.

image.alt: Smartphone-based virtual monitoring for orthodontic treatment

og_meta.title: Home - Dr. Alyssa Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Dr. Alyssa Orthodontics offers Invisalign®, braces, and virtual monitoring with friendly, patient-first care in Sherman, Bonham, and Gainesville, TX.

image.alt: Dr. Alyssa Emory-Carter smiling in the practice lobby at Dr. Alyssa Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: We deliver patient-centered orthodontic care in a warm, compassionate environment, combining clinical excellence with modern technology so every visit is comfortable and respectful.
Education and clear communication guide our care. We explain treatment options and timelines so families can make informed decisions that fit their lives.

We offer modern workflows — digital treatment planning, iTero® scanning, Invisalign<sup>®</sup> clear aligner therapy, and virtual monitoring — so treatment is convenient and efficient for children, teens, and adults.
Our team builds individualized treatment plans with flexible scheduling and a focus on comfort, helping patients leave our office feeling confident about their smile and their experience.

image.alt: Headshot of Dr. Alyssa Emory-Carter, owner and orthodontist

paragraphs.text: Dr. Alyssa Emory-Carter, Owner and Orthodontist, leads the practice with a patient-first approach. She focuses on comprehensive orthodontic care for children, teens, and adults, creating treatment plans tailored to each patient’s goals and lifestyle.

Dr. Alyssa is a Diamond Plus Invisalign<sup>®</sup> Provider and uses digital treatment planning and virtual monitoring to deliver predictable, convenient care. She enjoys meeting new patients and guiding families through every step of treatment.
Dr. Alyssa earned a BA from Oklahoma State University, completed her Doctor of Dental Surgery at Baylor College of Dentistry, and received her MS from the University of Florida College of Dentistry.

Dr. Alyssa is an active educator and speaker, with presentations at SWSO, AAO, Schulman Group, and OrthopreneursRD. She was named Key Opinion Leader Educator of the Year at the Dental Monitoring Summit in 2023.

She emphasizes community involvement and enjoys serving the small towns where she grew up and now practices. The practice frequently participates in local events and outreach in Sherman, Bonham, Gainesville, and surrounding areas.

image.alt: Dr. Alyssa Emory-Carter speaking at an educational event

og_meta.title: About Us | Dr. Alyssa Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Meet Dr. Alyssa Emory-Carter and the team. We offer digital treatment planning, Invisalign® therapy, and community-focused care across multiple locations.

image.alt: Smiling family welcomed at orthodontics front desk

paragraphs.text: Scheduling your complimentary consultation is as easy as pie! You can call either one of our offices, or look towards the bottom of this page to schedule your consultation.

We offer free consultations and observations until you're ready for treatment. At your first visit you'll meet the team, receive a complete exam with digital imaging, and learn which treatment options will best meet your needs.

image.alt: Parent and child checking in at orthodontic reception

paragraphs.text: We believe that everyone is entitled to a beautiful smile. Smiles have the ability to transform someone’s confidence, and by doing so, their life. This is why we offer a variety of payment plans to fit you and your needs.

During your complimentary consultation, our treatment coordinator will review estimated treatment investment and explain flexible payment options. We offer interest-free in‑office plans and can help arrange third‑party financing through CareCredit if needed.

Before your appointment, please complete our health history and patient information so we can provide safe, personalized care. Our appointment request and new patient form collect basic contact details, preferred days and times, whether this is a new patient, appointment type (in‑office or virtual), and medical and insurance information so Dr. Carter can prepare for your visit.

image.alt: Patient completing orthodontic health history forms online

seo.page_description: Schedule your complimentary consultation with Alyssa Orthodontics. Learn what to expect at your first visit, access patient forms, and explore financing options
seo.page_keywords: Alyssa Orthodontics, new patients, complimentary consultation, financing, forms, Sherman, Bonham

og_meta.title: Get Started | Alyssa Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Schedule your complimentary consultation with Alyssa Orthodontics. Learn what to expect at your first visit, access patient forms, and explore financing options

image.alt: Smiling patients of all ages at Lakeshore Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: Traditional metal braces remain a reliable option for many patients. Modern systems are smaller and more comfortable than in the past, offering predictable results for children, teens, and adults.
Ceramic braces use tooth-colored brackets for a lower-profile look. They deliver strong correction while blending in with your smile.

Invisalign<sup>®</sup> clear aligners are nearly invisible, removable, and comfortable. Using advanced 3D imaging, we design precise aligner stages so you can eat, brush, and live normally while straightening your teeth.

image.alt: Close-up of Invisalign aligners being placed on teeth

paragraphs.text: Many adults prefer Invisalign<sup>®</sup> for its discretion and convenience. Dr. Alyssa will review your goals and bite to determine whether aligners are the best option for your lifestyle.
Spark clear aligners are thin, clear, and designed for comfort and stain resistance. They’re a great choice for patients who want a highly esthetic, reliable aligner option.
Lingual braces attach to the back of your teeth for a truly hidden treatment. They’re custom-fit to your smile so you can correct alignment discreetly.
SureSmile® combines digital planning and precision archwire fabrication to make braces more efficient. The technology helps us move teeth predictably and shorten treatment when appropriate.

image.alt: 3D treatment planning software showing orthodontic simulation

paragraphs.text: Retainers protect the investment you made in your smile. We offer custom removable and fixed options and clear guidance so your results last for years.

image.alt: Beautiful young Asian woman smiling and holding orthodontic retainer

og_meta.description: Contact Alyssa Orthodontics to schedule a complimentary consultation at our Sherman, Bonham, or Gainesville offices. Call or request an appointment online.

image.alt: Patient smiling with orthodontic braces in our Emeryville office

paragraphs.text: We understand that starting orthodontic treatment can feel overwhelming. Below are clear answers to common questions about treatments, scheduling, financing, and daily care. If you don’t find what you need, contact our team — we’re happy to help.

We offer complimentary consultations where we perform a digital scan and take imaging. Dr. Carter will review your scan, x-rays, and goals, then outline a personalized treatment plan and timeline. We treat patients of all ages and will discuss which options fit your needs.
Every smile is unique, so exact costs vary. After your complimentary consultation we’ll provide a tailored estimate and review payment options to fit your budget.
We provide traditional braces as well as clear aligner options including Invisalign<sup>®</sup> and Spark aligners, plus retainers and other custom appliances to maintain your results.

The 30‑minute guideline helps keep aligners in the mouth as much as possible. It’s not a strict countdown: avoid long periods out, never drink anything but water with aligners in, rinse or brush before reinserting when possible, and clean aligners daily. Consistent wear improves predictability and can prevent delays.

Lingual braces are placed behind the teeth for a discreet look. You may feel initial discomfort and a temporary change in speech, but most patients adapt quickly. Suitability varies by case, so schedule a complimentary consultation to see if lingual braces are right for you.

Adults of any age can benefit from braces or aligners. Modern options are discreet and typically fit with busy schedules. Maintain excellent oral hygiene, prepare a travel care kit, attend follow-ups, and communicate openly with the team about comfort or goals.

We offer flexible, interest‑free office financing and can assist with third‑party options such as CareCredit (https://www.carecredit.com/). Our team will verify insurance benefits and explain payment plans at your consultation.
Brush and floss after meals when possible, rinse if you can’t brush right away, clean aligners daily, and use orthodontic wax for any irritation. Following these habits helps keep treatment on track.
